component.name: Element
component.description: An element is a fundamental part of an XML document. It consists of an opening tag, a closing tag, and the content enclosed between them.

component.name: Attribute
component.description: Attributes provide additional information about an element. They are specified within the opening tag and have a name and a value.

component.name: Text
component.description: Text is the character data contained within an element. It can include any valid text content, such as words, numbers, and symbols.

component.name: Comment
component.description: Comments are used for adding human-readable explanations or notes within an XML document. They are enclosed in ``.

component.name: Processing Instruction
component.description: Processing instructions are used to provide instructions to the application processing the XML. They start with ``.

component.name: CDATA Section
component.description: CDATA (Character Data) sections allow you to include unparsed character data within an element. They are enclosed in `` and ``.

component.name: Document Type Declaration (DTD)
component.description: A DTD defines the structure and the legal elements and attributes of an XML document. It is typically placed at the top of the document.
